amendment.description: Amendment sought to temporarily suspend the implementation and enforcement of workforce management and sourcing policies pursuant to the DoD's efficiency initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in House Report 112-88 to temporarily suspend the implementation and enforcement of workforce management and sourcing policies pursuant to the DODs efficiency initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Andrews amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 246 (Roll no. 352).
